efforts.name: Documentation Foundation
efforts.description: Establish comprehensive documentation practices and create foundational materials

projects.name: Initial Documentation
projects.description: Create essential documentation for setup and workflows

tasks.title: ⭐ Create setup guide
tasks.description: Document how to set up your environment. Include steps, configurations, prerequisites, and any gotchas you encountered.

tasks.title: Document your workflows
tasks.description: Write down your common workflows. Document how you use agents, what processes you follow, and best practices you've learned.

tasks.title: Create getting started guide
tasks.description: Write a beginner-friendly getting started guide. Help new users understand the basics and make their first steps easier.

tasks.title: Document common use cases
tasks.description: Create examples of common use cases. Show real-world scenarios and how to solve them with agents.

tasks.title: Build troubleshooting guide
tasks.description: Document common issues and solutions. Help users solve problems independently and reduce support burden.

tasks.title: Create FAQ document
tasks.description: Compile frequently asked questions and answers. Address common concerns and help users find information quickly.

tasks.title: ⭐ Organize documentation structure
tasks.description: Design a logical structure for your documentation. Create categories, sections, and navigation that makes sense for your users.

tasks.title: Create topic pages
tasks.description: Write detailed pages on key topics. Cover concepts, features, and how-tos in depth.

tasks.title: Add code examples
tasks.description: Include code examples in documentation. Show real, working examples that users can copy and adapt.

tasks.title: Create visual guides
tasks.description: Add diagrams, screenshots, and visual aids to documentation. Help users understand concepts visually.

tasks.title: Set up search functionality
tasks.description: Enable search in your documentation. Help users quickly find what they're looking for.

tasks.title: Keep documentation updated
tasks.description: Establish a process to keep documentation current. Review and update docs when features change.

efforts.name: User Guides & Tutorials
efforts.description: Create comprehensive guides and tutorials for users

projects.name: Tutorial Creation
projects.description: Build step-by-step tutorials for common tasks

tasks.title: ⭐ Identify tutorial topics
tasks.description: List key topics that need tutorials. Prioritize by user needs, complexity, and frequency of use.

tasks.title: Create beginner tutorials
tasks.description: Write tutorials for beginners. Start with basics and build up complexity gradually.

tasks.title: Build intermediate tutorials
tasks.description: Create tutorials for intermediate users. Cover more advanced topics and complex workflows.

tasks.title: Add tutorial exercises
tasks.description: Include hands-on exercises in tutorials. Let users practice what they learn with guided activities.

tasks.title: Create video tutorials
tasks.description: Produce video tutorials for visual learners. Cover key workflows and common tasks in video format.

tasks.title: Gather tutorial feedback
tasks.description: Collect feedback on tutorials. Improve based on user questions and confusion points.

projects.name: User Guides
projects.description: Create comprehensive user guides for different audiences

tasks.title: ⭐ Create user personas
tasks.description: Define different user personas. Understand their needs, goals, and technical levels to tailor guides.

tasks.title: Write quick reference guides
tasks.description: Create quick reference cards and cheat sheets. Help users quickly find common commands and workflows.

tasks.title: Build feature guides
tasks.description: Document each major feature in detail. Explain what it does, how to use it, and when to use it.

tasks.title: Create best practices guide
tasks.description: Document best practices and recommendations. Help users avoid common mistakes and follow proven patterns.

tasks.title: Write migration guides
tasks.description: Create guides for migrating from other tools or upgrading versions. Help users transition smoothly.

tasks.title: Build troubleshooting guides
tasks.description: Create detailed troubleshooting guides. Help users diagnose and fix common problems independently.

efforts.name: Community & Advocacy
efforts.description: Build community and advocate for the platform

projects.name: Community Building
projects.description: Foster a community around the platform

tasks.title: ⭐ Set up community channels
tasks.description: Create spaces for community interaction: forums, chat, or discussion groups. Choose platforms that fit your users.

tasks.title: Create community guidelines
tasks.description: Establish guidelines for community participation. Set expectations for behavior and content.

tasks.title: Engage with community members
tasks.description: Actively participate in community discussions. Answer questions, share tips, and build relationships.

tasks.title: Organize community events
tasks.description: Plan and host community events: webinars, office hours, or meetups. Bring users together.

tasks.title: Highlight community contributions
tasks.description: Showcase work from community members. Feature examples, case studies, and success stories.

tasks.title: Gather community feedback
tasks.description: Collect feedback from community. Understand user needs, pain points, and feature requests.

projects.name: Content Creation
projects.description: Create content to educate and engage users

tasks.title: ⭐ Plan content strategy
tasks.description: Develop a content strategy. Plan blog posts, videos, and other content that educates and engages users.

tasks.title: Write blog posts
tasks.description: Create blog posts on relevant topics. Share tips, case studies, and platform updates.

tasks.title: Create example projects
tasks.description: Build example projects that showcase platform capabilities. Provide code and documentation for users to learn from.

tasks.title: Produce video content
tasks.description: Create video content: demos, walkthroughs, and tutorials. Reach visual learners and provide engaging content.

tasks.title: Share success stories
tasks.description: Document and share success stories. Show how others are using the platform effectively.

tasks.title: Maintain content calendar
tasks.description: Plan and schedule regular content. Keep users engaged with consistent, valuable content.
